title: Mastodon
description: Shaggy elephants with large tusks. Live in icy or Lost World regions.
extras: Charge: In first round of combat, when not in melee. Requires a clear run of at least 20 yards. Tusks inflict double damage.	Trample: 3-in-4 chance of trampling each round. +4 to-hit human-sized or smaller creatures.	Ivory: 2d4 × 100gp per tusk.
